templates.template: _sql_constraints = [('${name_uniq}', 'unique (${name})', _('The Name of the OpenERPModel must be unique !')),${cursor} ]

template.description: compute- use for compute fields function
template.name: compute

template.description: Create a workflow instance for each given record IDs.
template.name: create workflow

template.description: Delete the workflow instances bound to the given record IDs.
template.name: delete workflow

templates.template: from openerp.tools import DEFAULT_SERVER_DATE_FORMAT as DF
from openerp.tools import DEFAULT_SERVER_DATETIME_FORMAT as DTF
from openerp.exceptions import except_orm, Warning, RedirectWarning
from openerp.tools import DEFAULT_SERVER_TIME_FORMAT as DTF

template.description: Odoo Inherir Model from other model
template.name: Odoo Inherit Model

templates.template:
from openerp import models, api, fields import addons.decimal_precision as dp from openerp.tools.translate import _
class ${ClassName}(models.Model): ''' Odoo Model ''' _inherit = '${odoomodel}'
${cursor}
${ClassName}()

template.description: Odoo Inherir TransientModel from other model
template.name: Odoo Inherit TransientModel

templates.template:
from openerp import models, api, fields import addons.decimal_precision as dp from openerp.tools.translate import _
class ${ClassName}(models.TransientModel): ''' Odoo Model ''' _inherit = '${odoomodel}'
${cursor}
${ClassName}()

See the #GNU General Public License for more details. # #You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License #along with this program. If not, see http://www.gnu.org/licenses. ########################################################################

from openerp import models, api, fields import addons.decimal_precision as dp from openerp.tools.translate import _
class ${ClassName}(models.Model): ''' Odoo Model ''' _name = '${odoomodel}' _description = '${odoomodel}'
${name} = fields.Char(string=u'${Name}', size=255, required=${False}, readonly=${False}, help=u"${}",),${cursor}
${ClassName}()

from openerp import models, api, fields import addons.decimal_precision as dp from openerp.tools.translate import _
class ${ClassName}(models.TransientModel): ''' Odoo Model ''' _name = '${odoomodel}' _description = '${odoomodel}'
${name} = fields.Char(string=u'${Name}', size=255, required=${False}, readonly=${False}, help=u"${}",),${cursor}
${ClassName}()

template.description: Rebind the workflow instance bound to the given 'old' record IDs to the given 'new' IDs. (``old_new_ids`` is a list of pairs ``(old, new)
template.name: redirect workflow

template.description: Send given workflow signal and return a dict mapping ids to workflow results
template.name: singal workflow

template.description: Reevaluate the workflow instances of the given record IDs
template.name: step workflow
